com.epimorphics.lda.core
Class ChainTree

java.lang.Object
  com.epimorphics.lda.core.ChainTree

public class ChainTree
extends Object

A collection of property chains represented as a triple (?item predicate ?value) and all the different tails of the chain, the followers, which are ChainTrees (qv).

          Render all (and only) the triples in this ChainTree as SPARQL triples.

          Render this ChainTree into sb as SPARQL constructs suitable for use in the WHERE clause of a SPARQL query.

make

public static com.epimorphics.lda.core.ChainTrees make(Any r,
                                                       View.State st,
                                                       List<PropertyChain> chains)
Convert a list of property chains to the chain tree representation. Convert wildcard predicates (originally '*' in the property chain string, and as a magic property in the PropertyChain objects) to a fresh variable.
